artist: Author: Charles Baudelaire; Artist: Marcel Gromaire; Publisher: Éditions des Quatre Chemins, Paris
creditline: Gift of Lisa and David Erickson
description: hardcover book bound in brown leather with vertical strip at center, front and back, bordered in gold, with spotted design in white, green and pale yellow; text in gold on spine; inner front and back cover end papers are green, rust red and gold; text and etchings; various Cubist-style images (figures, buildings, interiors, landscapes)
image_copyright: © Marcel Gromaire %2F Charles Baudelaire %2F %C3%89ditions des Quatre Chemins
provenance: Lisa and David Erickson, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2017.
title: Petits Poëms en Prose
